section.p: After successfully calling this method, you can listen to events of the corresponding object and retrieve data through . You can add multiple listeners for the same event as needed.
After successfully calling this method, you can listen to events and retrieve data from the object via . You can add multiple listeners for the same event as needed.

plentry.pd: The name of the target event to listen to. See .
Name of the target event to be listened to. See .
